chapter.title: Software management
chapter.para: This chapter discusses how to manage software inside the Spacewalk server. To illustrate our strategy, we will create a Directory Server using software from a static software channel.

After the RHDS is installed, we want to make the system dummy proof. In short, if an administrator is logged in on the system, he should not be able to simply change it by running yum update. Hence, the requirements we impose on the installed system and its connection to the Spacewalk server are:
The yum repositories to which the system has access on the Spacewalk server must be constant.
From the repositories it must be clear what version of the software set we are using.
